jobTitle: Systems Integration Analyst / Data Integrity & Con
jobDescription: Position Description: Role is to validate Contracts from Field Sales to the CRM Promotions. Identify gaps and communicate to sales teams. Document validation and maintain listings of issues and completion of validation data. Other validation and systems assistance as needed to meet deadlines for data issue resolution. Potential for system loads. Team approach is used to support the systems issues. Skills Required: Excel, Communications with Sales teams (or systems users), Email, systems or data maintenance experience preferred. Experience Required: Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook, systems issue resolution, interpersonal skills in working with systems users Education Required: HS with Degree favorable
